HbalTrbah.title: Hbal Trbah
HbalTrbah.description: HbalTrbah is more than a platform; it‚Äôs a mindset. Designed to push the boundaries of creativity and ambition, it blends art, technology, and storytelling. It embodies the journey of those who dare to challenge norms, turn failures into opportunities, and continuously seek inspiration to grow.

TimeForge App.title: TimeForgeApp
TimeForge App.description: TimeForge is a time management and productivity tracking application designed to optimize personal and professional organization. With an intuitive interface and powerful analytical tools, it allows users to visualize daily activities and make informed decisions for better time management.

SwapBot.title: SwapBot for Injective on Telegram
SwapBot.description: Facilitate secure and direct cryptocurrency exchanges via Telegram, using smart contracts on the Injective blockchain for complete and efficient automation.

BuyBot.title: BuyBot for Injective on Telegram
BuyBot.description: An automated bot that notifies INJ swap transactions, displaying real-time exchange quantities, new market cap, and other relevant market data on a dedicated Telegram channel.

WheelEazy.title: WheelEazy
WheelEazy.description: A peer-to-peer bicycle rental marketplace for medium to long-term durations.

TailwindGenAI.title: Tailwind-Gen-AI
TailwindGenAI.description: A Next.js application integrating Vercel SDK and OpenAI libraries to convert user prompts into responsive web pages. Utilizes Tailwind CSS for an elegant and adaptive design.

DoFlex.title: DoFlex
DoFlex.description: Goal management through mind mapping. Currently under construction, DoFlex will enable users to visualize and manage their personal and professional goals in an intuitive and efficient manner.
